content: I mean, as you heard us say, it definitely impacted our Q1 pushing some revenues out I think one of the things that we've really come to dial in with our supply chain over the past couple of quarters that we've been talking about this for 3, 4 quarters at this point about really needing to get ahead of our purchasing and such and placing much longer lead time on orders than we would have traditionally done, starting even in Q2 of last year that we saw, at first, a lot of lead times push out to 26-plus weeks.
